title: Bon Jovi - Spectrum, Philadelphia, PA, USA 22-02-1993
description:
Here is a nice bootleg. Check my account for more classic bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)

Artist: Bon Jovi
Date: February 22nd, 1993
Venue: Spectrum
Location: Philadelphia, PA, USA

Setlist:
Radio announcement of the concert
(cut in) Wild In The Streets
I'd Die For You
You Give Love A Bad Name
Born To Be My Baby
I Can't Help Falling In Love (acapella)
Bed of Roses
Keep The Faith
Blood Money
Blaze of Glory
Lay Your Hands On Me
In These Arms
Blood On Blood
Bad Medicine / Shout
Richie Acoustic Guitar Solo
Wanted Dead Or Alive
Livin' On A Prayer
I'll Sleep When I'm Dead
Never Say Goodbye (acoustic)


NOTE:
A few years ago I finally got a copy from the original 8mm master tape.
Great quality and one hell of a show, Jon even goes into the middle of the Audience at one point! 
Only downsides are that the video suffers under very little colour problems sometimes (probably due to the age) and that the audio suffers from a female fan standing next to the camera on some songs. 
Jon sings two verses of "I Can't Help Falling In Love" before starting "Bed of Roses".
Furthermore I don't get why this filmer used to add these weird effects to his videos every once in a while (he did the same on the August show).

Menu/Chapters: Yes/Not matching (1 DVD)
Angle: Audience (stage filmed)
Source: master
